cont.entity_a: Perfect starter choice for beginners. Great for hobbyists and semi-pros. Easy to learn and use for beginners.
cont.entity_b: Serves well as a backup system.

cont.entity_a: The DSLR offers more features than expected. Lens included is very nice. Upgraded CMOS sensor and larger LCD display are beneficial. Offers creative control and versatility. Comes with various shooting modes.
cont.entity_b: Fast autofocus with a good lens. Top of the line professional DX camera.

cont.entity_a: High quality and takes excellent high-res digital photos. Solid Canon quality at a reasonable price. Least digital noise in higher ISO settings. Excellent picture quality. Well-constructed and durable.
cont.entity_b: Strong and reliable build. Produces sharp 16x24 prints. Outstanding image quality.

cont.entity_a: Metal pins for the Cfast memory card were slightly bent and problematic. The camera body is smaller and lighter than previous models. Fits well in small hands. Lightweight and compact. Good for travel due to size and weight.
cont.entity_b: Heavy but manageable. Small review screen compared to newer models.

cont.entity_a: Solid Canon quality at a reasonable price. Great balance between price and quality of output. Great value for the price.
cont.entity_b: Great deal for the price paid.

cont.entity_a: Durable body and user-friendly settings. Well-constructed and durable.
cont.entity_b: Performs well even after several years.

cont.entity_a: Easy to use with intuitive controls. Easy to learn and use for beginners.
Compatible with a wide range of lenses.

cont.entity_b: Arrived on time and in perfect condition.

cont.entity_a: Takes great pictures with good detail and speed. Quick change on point of focus and a larger LCD viewer.
cont.entity_b: Works flawlessly. Excellent low ISO performance.
